scripts.image:build:dev: docker build --build-arg WWWGROUP=$(id -g) --build-arg WWWUSER=$UID -f src/www.lidonation.com/Dockerfile.dev -t lidonation src/www.lidonation.com/.
scripts.register:test: docker run -it --rm --name registration -e NODE_NAME='registration' -e NODE_PORT=3010 -e CARDANO_NETWORK='test' -e PROMETHEUS_PORT=12798 -e EKG_PORT=12788 -e NODE_PATH='/data' -e CREATE_STAKEPOOL='true' -e POOL_PLEDGE='75000000000' -e POOL_COST='340000000' -e POOL_MARGIN='0.05' -e METADATA_URL='https://www.lidonation.com/metadata.json' -v $PWD/data/relay/:/data/  -v $PWD/src/pool/config/registration/:/config/ registry.lidonation.com/lidonation/lidonation/cardano:latest /bin/bash entrypoint --start --create-cold
scripts.run:register: docker run -it --rm --name registration -e NODE_NAME='registration' -e NODE_PORT=3010 -e CARDANO_NETWORK='test' -e PROMETHEUS_PORT=12798 -e EKG_PORT=12788 -e NODE_PATH='/data' -e CREATE_STAKEPOOL='true' -e POOL_PLEDGE='75000000000' -e POOL_COST='340000000' -e POOL_MARGIN='0.05' -e METADATA_URL='https://www.lidonation.com/metadata.json' -v $PWD/data/relay/:/data/  -v $PWD/src/pool/config/registration/:/config/ registry.lidonation.com/lidonation/lidonation/cardano:latest /bin/bash
scripts.run:registration:main: docker run -it --name registration-main -p 12798:12798 -e NODE_PORT='3000' -e NODE_NAME='registration' -e CARDANO_NETWORK='main' -e CREATE_STAKEPOOL='true' -e POOL_PLEDGE='75000000000' -e POOL_COST='340000000' -e POOL_MARGIN='0.05' -e METADATA_URL='https://www.lidonation.com/metadata.json' -v $PWD/src/pool/main/config/:/config/ registry.lidonation.com/lidonation/lidonation/cardano:latest --start --create-cold
scripts.setup: docker-compose exec lidolovelace-web-fpm-service bash 'rm -rf storage/app/public/* && php artisan migrate:fresh --seed'
